post:
Hey :)

I m pleased to announce the arrivals of new datacenters location for So you Start. You are the firsts aware of it.  Not even on website (yet).

For now only 1 server is available (XEON-SAT-1-32) in Germany / Poland.
 
UK server will follow in early september.

Here are details of this server:

**XEON-SAT-1-32 Server**

Intel Xeon D-1520  
32GB DDR4 ECC 2133MHz
SoftRaid 4x2TB

39.99€ ex-VAT (+20€ setup fees)

https://www.soyoustart.com/ie/order/soYouStart.xml?reference=1807sys62 for PL (Warsaw)
https://www.soyoustart.com/ie/order/soYouStart.xml?reference=1808sys62 for DE (Francfort)

Cheers !
